condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :49266-BD | Description: The Recipient shall have its financial statements audited. Each audit shall cover theperiod of one fiscal year and be furnished no later than 6 months after the end of such period. | Frequency : Yearly

Finance Agreement :49266-BD | Description: The Recipient shall prepare interim un-audited financial reports every six calendarmonths, no later than 45 days after the end of each calendar quarter. | Frequency : Quarterly
Finance Agreement :49266-BD | Description: The Recipient shall prepare project reports every six calendar months, no later than 45days after the end of the period covered. | Frequency :Semi Annual

title.narrative: Total amount of equity from the private sector entrepreneurs on the transactions supported by IPFF
Total amount of equity and debt financing from IPFF, GoB, and local financial institutions
The project results in 100 MW of additional electricity added to national capacity

Number of financial institutions using the IPFF (cumulative figure).
Percentage of PFIs maintaining Bangladesh Bank eligibility criteria
Percentage of financed infrastructure projects using DOE environmental assessments
Percentage of projects reviewed for project eligibility on behalf of Bangladesh Bank
Number of PFI staff trained to undertake financial analysis of infrastructure projects.
Long term debt financing for infrastructure increases (as measured by cumulative debt financing from IPFF)
